headline: Is Halliburton (HAL) Priced Attractive After Mixed Returns And Strong DCF-Earnings Signals?
summary: If you are wondering whether Halliburton's share price still reflects fair value, starting with what the current market is pricing in can help you frame your next move. Halliburton's stock closed at US$30.38, with returns of 7.5% over the last week, 8.2% over the last month, 2.6% year to date, 15.7% over the last year, a 20.7% decline over three years, and 54.1% over five years. Taken together, this gives you a mixed picture of recent and longer term sentiment. Recent attention on oilfield...
